answers.text:
The City of Olathe is currently implementing a performance measure dashboard for several of our departments. Some of the measures we are looking to include are sick leave (hours & dollars spent), overtime, salaries (full-time & seasonal), employee engagement (from annual survey results), and some related to risk management.

author: Gregory Stopka
text: I have a member that is looking for specific benchmarking information for HR, benefits, and payroll departments.  They are looking for specifically what data is worth tracking and how to track it.  For example, many local governments track turn-over rates; especially important for high-turnover companies such as retailers.  What else should an HR department be tracking, and how?  What is important to track, and to try an improve?
title: HR Benchmarking
